Ken gives some tips about tuning your system to work with XOR here:
http://=
www.cs.ucf.edu/~kstanley/neat.html under "How should I test my
own version =
of NEAT to make sure it works?".  They should all still be
applicable to yo=
ur current problem, so that would be a good place to
start.  If you're stil=
l not getting good scores, let us know and maybe
we offer additional assist=
ance or try running it ourselves.

David D'Ambrosio
